data.message: Em... I'm 30 years old. Grew up with your music. Never got to see you perform. Please get back on tour. You've got many fans that couldn't afford it when we were younger and now as adults we (speaking for the majority of my generation) want to see you and Dre in concert.

replies.message: Last I heard he is going on the new Up in Smoke tour I believe. Before that though he always said if you want to see him perform in the US then you have to go to Detroit. Other then that it was all international
I live in Germany currently stationed in US Army... haven't heard of a  world tour
I would love to see him live one time in my life!
Getty ballard you're absolutly right. I'm too 30 y and waiting and waiting and hope for any concert since over 14 years.
Lol, you're 12 years past 18 talking about not being able to do something lol. Just fucking around but thats why you do whatever you want whenever you can in life
He's amazing! I saw him in Detroit on the monster tour! Definitely hope I get to see at least one more concert in my life, and maybe get a little bit closer to stage!
Fucking exactly man, I'm 28 and by the time I was old enough to go see rap shows Em was off on sleeping pills.
Got lucky and saw him in ATX 2 years ago. Stood in the crowd for 8 hours waiting for him to perform. Worth it.
Hes perfoming in Glasgow, leeds and reading on august
he still does meet N' greets? right?

I live in The Netherlands, ik 33years old. Seen him once here in Netherlands in 1998 or 1999...flew 2 times to England and 1 time to France to see his concerts... So i seen him 4 times now, could've  5 times if Pukkelpop (yeah that was what the festival was called) wasn't xancelled by heavy storms and rain...

So step up and go see him in an another country... I did...
1999 was at the height of his popularity... I didn't have the means to see him. Now he's not going in tour as often.
Same here
Saw him on his rapture tour. Must see before you die - he's incredible
Hes doesnt really do tours. He does some festivals and a few shows here and there but he not big on touring
I can relate to that 110%
He's said he doesn't go on big tours anymore because it's an addiction trigger for him.
I live in reading and he is playing at reading festival this augusy
Yes please
See you in Glasgow at bellahouston Eminem 😂😂
No
Me too
Yes,please Come to Thailand!!😍🙏🏻❤️
Hes headlining leeds in august
Seen him 3 times here in the UK and in August I'm seeing him again at reading! :-)
